WorkItem.ClosedComment: Thanks for reporting this! The issue has been fixed and can be tried out in the upcoming 0.9.5 release. We also have a beta available (https://typescript.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=TypeScript%200.9.5%20beta) if you'd like to try it out.
WorkItem.Description:
1. in the playground have code like this
```
class C {
	
}

C.prototype;
```
2. click on the word 'prototype'
> the console shows an error in the language service

0: "TypeError: Cannot read property 'name' of undefined"
1: "    at a.add (http://www.typescriptlang.org/Script/vs/languages/typescript/lib/typescriptServices.js:1:575631)"
2: "    at b.findBaseTypesTransitiveClosure (http://www.typescriptlang.org/Script/vs/languages/typescript/lib/typescriptServices.js:1:576607)"
3: "    at b.findMemberOverridesImpl (http://www.typescriptlang.org/Script/vs/languages/typescript/lib/typescriptServices.js:1:579752)"
4: "    at b.findMemberOverrides (http://www.typescriptlang.org/Script/vs/languages/typescript/lib/typescriptServices.js:1:579302)"
5: "    at b.getReferencesForSymbol (http://www.typescriptlang.org/Script/vs/languages/typescript/lib/typescriptServices.js:1:536004)"
6: "    at b.getReferencesForSourceLocation (http://www.typescriptlang.org/Script/vs/languages/typescript/lib/typescriptServices.js:1:535114)"
7: "    at b.getOccurrencesAtPosition (http://www.typescriptlang.org/Script/vs/languages/typescript/lib/typescriptServices.js:1:534227)"
8: "    at a.findOccurrences (http://www.typescriptlang.org/Script/vs/languages/typescript/typescriptWorker2.js:1:34009)"

Comments.Message: Thanks for the report, I've marked this as active.
